definition: flowers on red silk (a traditional gift to celebrate weddings etc)/a bonus/crab apple (Malus asiatica)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
green willow and red flowers/all the colors of spring

sentences.english: Ask three thousand hair grows pale anxious, make a tail piece of petal bonus.
sentences.chinese: 抚荑三千青丝淡愁，凑出尾尾落瓣花红片片成双。

sentences.english: Bonus again being held up, and will Wenzhan after three days.
sentences.chinese: 花红再次被关押了起来，并且将要在三天以后问斩。

sentences.english: All staff received a Christmas bonus of $100.
sentences.chinese: 全体职员都获得100美元的圣诞节花红。

sentences.english: The bonus told the five children with people outside the door to protect the big headed.
sentences.chinese: 花红告诉小五子带着人去门外面保护大当家。

sentences.english: Bonus is not compulsory, subject to company &individual performance.
sentences.chinese: 年冬花红的发放取决于公司度的业绩和个人的表现。

sentences.english: In the confusion, in order to save bonuses, Chen injured three guns.
sentences.chinese: 在一片混战之中，为了救下来花红，陈三炮重伤。

sentences.english: In the smoke of ragged tree spring day, bonus of dots, evil spirit charming.
sentences.chinese: 在那烟树整齐地春日里，花红点点，煞是诱人。

sentences.english: In order to be right and proper three guns and bonuses, Chen wants to get married.
sentences.chinese: 为了更加的名正言顺，陈三炮想要和花红成亲。

sentences.english: Bonus to drink wine, and Shenjiamen dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 花红喝下了酒，和沈家门对话。

sentences.english: Red is the color of Rhododendron State bonus, blue represents peace.
sentences.chinese: 红色是国花红杜鹃的颜色，蓝色代表和平。

definition: autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
oriole or various birds of the Sylvidae family including warblers
to swirl about/(of leaves and branches) to sway
rouge and powder/(fig.) the fair sex
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
